page.title: 17THE VILLAGE OF EATHORPE
page.content: {Mrs Reeve}has lived in Eathorpe for 55 years and the village has had very few changes during that time. Only 3 houses have been built. When she came to the village nearly everyone worked either in or around the village on the land. They got to work on bikes or foot.Most of the people used to work in the village but now they work in Coventry or Leamington. During the day the village is empty yet at night there are cars all down the main street. The village never had its own {Blacksmith}but it had one that came from another village.He shod mainly working horses.Now he shoes riding horses and ponies.The{Water Mill }was used for grinding corn to make flour for the bread. The bread was made at the{Bakehouse.}
